parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the topic you're creating a refresh schedule for.

parameters.name: TopicId
parameters.description: The ID of the topic that you want to modify. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

parameters.name: DatasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset.

parameters.name: RefreshSchedule
parameters.description: The definition of a refresh schedule. A Boolean value that controls whether to schedule is enabled. A Boolean value that controls whether to schedule runs at the same schedule that is specified in SPICE dataset. StartingAt (datetime) --- The starting date and time for the refresh schedule. Timezone (string) --- The timezone that you want the refresh schedule to use. RepeatAt (string) --- The time of day when the refresh should run, for example, Monday-Sunday. TopicScheduleType (string) --- The type of refresh schedule. Valid values for this structure are HOURLY, DAILY, WEEKLY, and MONTHLY.

nested_params.name: IsEnabled
nested_params.description: A Boolean value that controls whether to schedule is enabled.

nested_params.name: BasedOnSpiceSchedule
nested_params.description: A Boolean value that controls whether to schedule runs at the same schedule that is specified in SPICE dataset.

nested_params.name: StartingAt
nested_params.description: The starting date and time for the refresh schedule.

nested_params.name: Timezone
nested_params.description: The timezone that you want the refresh schedule to use.

nested_params.name: RepeatAt
nested_params.description: The time of day when the refresh should run, for example, Monday-Sunday.

nested_params.name: TopicScheduleType
nested_params.description: The type of refresh schedule. Valid values for this structure are HOURLY, DAILY, WEEKLY, and MONTHLY.

nested_items.name: TopicId
nested_items.description: The ID of the topic that you want to modify. This ID is unique per Amazon Web Services Region for each Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: TopicArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic.

nested_items.name: DatasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.
